mapper.update: update w_weather set city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weather_time = #{weatherTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, weather_1 = #{weather1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_2 = #{weather2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_3 = #{weather3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_4 = #{weather4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_5 = #{weather5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_6 = #{weather6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_7 = #{weather7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_8 = #{weather8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weather_9 = #{weather9,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where weather_id = #{weatherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select weather_id, city_name, weather_time, weather_1, weather_2, weather_3, weather_4, weather_5, weather_6, weather_7, weather_8, weather_9 from w_weather where weather_id = #{weatherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select weather_id, city_name, weather_time, weather_1, weather_2, weather_3, weather_4, weather_5, weather_6, weather_7, weather_8, weather_9 from w_weather
select * from w_weather where weather_time>#{todayZeroDate} GROUP BY city_id order by weather_time DESC
select * from w_weather where city_id = 1 ORDER BY weather_time desc limit 1
